entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming south 20 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
